casebody.data:
P&C SIERRA, L.L.C., Paul Sierra, and Corinne Sierra, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
John M. CARROLL, Defendant-Appellee. No. 18-0826 Court of Appeals of Iowa. Filed January 9, 2019

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION See Iowa R. App. P. 6.904

The plaintiffs appeal from the district court order granting summary judgment in favor of the defendant on their legal-malpractice claims. AFFIRMED.

AFFIRMED.
